text: Rose Leslie is exactly like all of us — she doesn ’ t want the end of Game of Thrones to be spoiled! On Monday night ’ s episode of Late Night with Seth Meyers, Leslie talked about forcing her fiancé, Kit Harington, to keep the finale of their HBO show a secret from her. “ I mean talk about being an avid fan, I obviously am of the Good Wife, ” mentioning her new CBS series, “ but with Game of Thrones, ” she continued, “ I ’ m like the rest of the world. I ’ m waiting for the new and final season. ” Since her character and John Snow ‘ s love interest, Ygritte, was killed off in the fourth season, Kit was the only one of the two to receive the script for the final season
